articles.author: Shakeel Sobhan, Wesley Dockery
articles.title: SCO summit: Xi, Modi seek closer China-India ties - DW
articles.description: Chinese Premier Xi Jinping met India's Prime Minister Narendra Modi in China, vowing closer ties despite a border dispute. The two-day SCO summit brings together leaders from more than 20 nations. Follow DW live.
articles.content:
Since its founding in 2001, the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) has primarily been dominated by China and RussiaImage: Andres Martinez Casares/Getty Images
